content: learn how to crochet this pretty flower garden bookmark with this crochet pattern a free copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog as of may 7 2020 https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 24 single_crochet x 24 row = 4 inches finished size approximately 2 x 6 inches excluding tassel yarn patons grace® 100% mercerized cotton 1 75 oz 50 g 136 yds 125 m light weight 3 you will need three colours approximately 20 yards of each hook size 4/e 3 5 mm hook notions yarn needle
